channel.title: Need help editing a video in Sony Vegas 7.0 or another editor u know of
channel.description: i have a problem in Vegs 7.0 where i add the video to the timeline, and the first 3 quarters of it is just red :S any1 know how to fix it? i think its cuz the video is 50 mins but i dont like it red, cuz when i play it it just turns out black or red.

lol im talkin about EDITING a video. anyways, im using a faster comp so it works… now i just need to learn how to use it.
